spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placements are mostly correct, but some wall alignments are slightly off. Many doors are misplaced or their orientation is incorrect, and some windows are also misplaced.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent in some areas. Several doors are not correctly embedded into walls. There are no missing or hallucinated rooms, but adjacency relationships are affected by incorrect door placements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate, but some items are scaled incorrectly or oriented differently than the floor plan, such as the dining table and chairs.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera and orthographic projection are generally good. Lighting quality is decent, and geometry is clean. Visual clarity is good despite the inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Misplaced door between the bedroom (top-left) and corridor.
Incorrect orientation of the door to the top-right bedroom.
Misplaced window in the upper left room.
Proportion distortion of the dining table and chairs in the central dining area.
Misplaced door to the bathroom adjacent to the top-right bedroom.
Misplaced door to the bathroom near the bottom right bedroom.
Misplaced windows in the bottom-right bedroom.
Misplaced windows in the bottom-left kitchen area.
Incorrect orientation of the main entrance door at the bottom center.
Misplaced window in the small room at the bottom-left exterior.
Proportion distortion of the bed in the bottom-right bedroom.
Wall alignment issue in the entrance to the top-left bedroom.
Wall thickness inconsistency around some doorframes.
Misplaced elements in the kitchen counter area (stovetop and sink).
